channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2181] Confirmed: HOPA Dry Erase Girl Is A Hoax, Identity Revealed
item.description: Professional pranksters cook their biggest hoax yet.

item.title: [+1659] I spent a year following the literal word of the Bible (TED)
item.description: TED Talks Speaking at the most recent EG conference, author, philosopher, prankster and journalist A.J. Jacobs talks about the year he spent living biblically -- following the rules in the Bible as literally as possible.

item.title: [+1057] Illustrated: How to Properly Exit an Aircraft [Pic]
[+894] 10 Things You Can't Be Asked at a Job Interview
item.description: Applying for a job can be a stressful pursuit as an applicant prepares answers to those predictable questions, and hopes that his research will help him stand out amongst the sea of eager applicants. Whether fresh out of college, or re-entering the workforce after a long hiatus from the nine to five grind, one way to prepare yourself for an ...

item.title: [+841] Where's the relief for homeowners who played by rules?
item.description: The misdeeds on Wall Street that worsened the financial crisis have created a legion of angry homeowners asking, "Where's MY bailout?"

item.title: [+808] Invisibility Cloak Made From Silk
item.description: For thousands of years people have worn shimmering silk to stand out in a crowd. Within the next few years people could wear silk to become invisible in a a crowd.

item.title: [+751] Hillary Clinton Drags Taliban Leader's Body Through Streets
[+644] 4Chan Founder Explains /b/ Hilariously To Federal Prosecutor
item.description: Q: And is there any significance to “new fags”?A: That is the term used to describe new users to the site.Q: What about “b tard”?

item.title: [+614] Don't Tax the Internet
item.description: A new piece of legislation claims to level the playing field between Internet retailers and brick-and-mortar stores, but this "fairness" bill is anything but.

item.title: [+574] iPhone Girls Are Easy
item.description: iPhone users have more sexual partners than BlackBerry or Android owners. By age 30, the average male iPhone user has had about 10 partners while female iPhone users have had 12. By contrast, BlackBerry users hover around 8 partners and Android users have a mere 6.

item.title: [+514] Albino and Half-Albino Peacocks (Photos)
item.description: Within the plumage of a peacock lies a complex architecture that's continually changing color. Or so it seems. Amazingly enough, though the bird revered for its majestic colors it is just as stunning--if not more so--without them. While the it's often called an albino peacock, it is nothing of the sort.

item.title: [+512] Canadian Children Are Advanced (PIC)
[+504] Hell comes to Lego Land In this post-apocalyptic diorama
item.description: Nannan Zhang and Tyler Clites showcased this Lego sculpture, "Containment," at Chicago's Brickworld festival. Containment sports a moving monorail, robotic conveyor belts, and a mutant wasteland. It'd be totally foreboding if it wasn't totally adorable

item.title: [+489] The Middle Class: How We Got One and Why We Need to Keep It
item.description: For Americans, being middle class is part of our national ethos. People who, based on income level are poor, rich or middle class view themselves, and are usually identified by others, as being middle class. The phrase can be modified by "upper" or "lower" to mean rich or poor,

item.title: [+468] Greg Gutfeld Proposes Gay Bar Next to Ground Zero Mosque
item.description: Gutfled claims his gay bar idea is completely serious: "This is not a joke. I've already spoken to a number of investors, who have pledged their support in this bipartisan bid for understanding and tolerance."

item.title: [+451] How To Improve Your Android's Battery Life
item.description: In the words of Google co-founder Larry Page, "if you are not getting a day [of Android battery] there is something wrong." There must be "something wrong" with a lot of our phones, so hence the How-To Geek's practical guide.

item.title: [+446] Hallmark was kind of Epic in the 50s...(Pic)
[+434] Rumor: Borderlands Studio Reviving Duke Nukem Forever
item.description: There may be hope yet for the ludicrously long-in-the-making Duke Nukem Forever. Sources claiming to have knowledge of the situation tell Kotaku that Duke Nukem Forever development continues at a new home, Borderlands developer Gearbox Software.

item.title: [+426] 11 Revolting Things Government Lets in Your Food (slideshow)
item.description: Worried about Rat Hair and Mice Poop in Your Cereal? Uncle Sam Says Eat Up.

item.title: [+424] Ultra Realistic Street Fighter Art
item.description: See some of the coolest art for Guile, Sagat, Cammy White, Ryu and many more in action.
